metadata.description: Complete GitHub data for Issue #4 - captured for offline access and archival purposes
purpose: Offline access when GitHub is unavailable
Recovery data if GitHub history is lost
Reference for AI judgment on GitHub data availability
Migration support to other repository hosting services
Immediate local access to issue information

issue.title: Improve Workspace Tooling and Development Environment
issue.body: リポジオリのローカル↔リモートの同期です
